backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining types and state for reviews, articles, bikes, comments, ratings, and user profiles with access control and CRUD logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old bike records to a new format by adding priceRange, images, and details fields with defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs for build traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining root theme variables and dark mode overrides with base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all routes and wrapping the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component showing about text, category/region links, social icons, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, category links, search, and authenticated user actions including drafts, bike management, and article creation.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper rendering header, footer, routed content, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/BikeForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing bike entries with fields for specs, pricing, images, and region.
frontend/src/components/BikeSelector.tsx: Popover-based searchable selector for choosing a bike from a list.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Grid of category cards linking to category pages with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: Comments section for a review with form submission, listing, and moderation actions.
Displays side‑by‑side bike specifications and review score comparisons.
frontend/src/components/LatestLaunchesCa: Carousel showing latest article launches with title, region, preview, and author.
frontend/src/components/ModerationMenu.t: Provides a moderation menu for comments with hide and delete actions, including a confirmation dialog for deletion.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a required profile setup dialog for new authenticated users, allowing them to input name and bio.
frontend/src/components/RatingWidget.tsx: Displays average user ratings for a review and allows authenticated users to submit their own rating.
frontend/src/components/RegionFilter.tsx: Renders a tabs-based UI for selecting a region filter and triggers updates on selection changes.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuthActio: Wraps actions requiring authentication, prompting unauthenticated users to sign in before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/ScoreBreakdown.t: Shows detailed review score categories with progress bars and the overall score badge.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Retrieves authentication status, user profile, admin status, and related loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating articles, reviews, ratings, and profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full article by ID with loading, not‑found handling, and category navigation.
frontend/src/pages/BikeDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed motorcycle info by ID including images, region, and price with loading and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Lists all bikes for a specific brand with loading, not‑found handling, and brand-level navigation.
frontend/src/pages/BrandsPage.tsx: Displays all motorcycle brands with search filtering and counts of available models.
frontend/src/pages/BuyingGuideDetailPage: Shows a buying guide article with metadata, checklist, and navigation back to the buying guides category.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Lists articles or reviews for a category with region filtering, loading states, and review scoring display.
frontend/src/pages/ComparePage.tsx: Provides UI to select two bikes and display a comparison table with specs and reviews.
frontend/src/pages/CreateArticlePage.tsx: Form page for creating or saving articles with fields for title, content, author, category, and region.
frontend/src/pages/CreateReviewPage.tsx: Form page for creating or saving motorcycle reviews with bike selection, ratings, and region input.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing hero section, latest launches, trending bikes, and category navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ManageBikesPage.tsx: Authenticated page to create, edit, and delete user-owned bike listings with a form and list view.
frontend/src/pages/MyDraftsPage.tsx: Displays and manages the user's draft articles and reviews, including publishing actions.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed review page by fetching reviews and bikes, showing content, specs, scoring, and comments.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Fetches articles, reviews, and bikes, filters them by a search query, and displays grouped results with matching brands.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, issues, schema version, and image requirements.
